betterLab:BetterLab.NAME: Better Lab
DESCRIPTIONS: You find yourself in a room filled with racks of test tubes, beakers, flasks, forceps, pinch clamps, stirring rods, tongs, goggles, funnels, pipets, cylinders, condensers, and even a rare spiral tube of glass. NL NL Why do you know the name of all these tools? It doesn't matter, you take a look around.
After much time spent mixing, swirling, and performing other important tasks, you receive your new concoction and carry on your way...
You spot a book lying on the table titled "Chemical Y" and decide to follow it's instructions. NL Making careful use of your Chemical X, you transmute the flask into a much more pure substance.

You spot a book lying on the table with #rthree #gcolorful #bladies on the cover and decide to follow it's instructions. NL You prepare the concoction and finish it by offering a bit of your own #rblood into the flask.
